reviewText: I really enjoy this type of documentary and im really glad that I came across this. here is another alchemy dvd that is also very interesting, The Magnum Opus

Like all 50 minute documentary programs, this one cannot be considered a comprehensive treatment of the subject of alchemy, but it is a good basic program none-the-less.  I don't think that any of the info is off track; it's a good intro and covers the important bullet points.  I liked this DVD very much on balance, and am glad to add it to my library on occult topics.
